channel.title: 4 Things
channel.description: OK 1.How Do I Make A Commands Command To Make A List That Shows All Command List 2.Also A Info List To Tell Stuff About My Server... 3.How Do I Move My HighScore Board. 4. And ::God[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2008, 05:18:08 pm[/size][hr]If I Could Rep++ I Would....[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2008, 05:27:29 pm[/size][hr]any one??...

item.title: 4 Things
item.dc:creator: @jacked4fun1 jacked4fun1
item.description:
@jacked4fun1 wrote:

[code]1.[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“commands”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest("@dre@Player Commands", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@Normal Commands", 8145);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::modinfo ::skills ::home ::shops ::slayer@dre@@dbl@", 8147);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::kqueen ::jad ::barrows ::drags ::drags2@dre@@dbl@", 8148);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::yell ::suggest ::players ::afk@dbl@", 8149);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::pk ::edge ::mb ::pkbox ::fightpits ::cwars ::anti@dre@@dbl@", 8150);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::sell ::cancelbuy ::buy ::search ::cancelsell@dbl@", 8151);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@", 8152);
sendQuest("@dbl@@whi@Mods@whi@@dbl@", 8153);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::master ::pure ::sweet ::notedbarrows ::food ::dragonarmor ::dragonweapons@dbl@", 8154);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::kick ::modwear ::modrich@dbl@", 8155);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@", 8156);
sendQuest("@dbl@@yel@Admin@yel@@dbl@", 8157);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::banuser ::god ::pnpc ::normal ::xrichie ::xteletome ::xteleto@dbl@", 8158);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::runes ::barrage ::arrows ::bank ::adminwear@dbl@", 8159);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@", 8160);
sendQuest("@dbl@@gre@Owner@gre@@dbl@", 8161);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::pickup ::ipban ::xteleall@dre@@dbl@", 8162);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::givemod ::giveadmin ::giveowner ::demote@dbl@", 8163);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::mantas@dbl@", 8164);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();

}[/code]add that to client java under another command.

2.basically the same as one but

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“info”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest("@dre@Player Commands", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@Normal Commands", 8145);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::modinfo ::skills ::home ::shops ::slayer@dre@@dbl@", 8147);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::kqueen ::jad ::barrows ::drags ::drags2@dre@@dbl@", 8148);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::yell ::suggest ::players ::afk@dbl@", 8149);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::pk ::edge ::mb ::pkbox ::fightpits ::cwars ::anti@dre@@dbl@", 8150);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::sell ::cancelbuy ::buy ::search ::cancelsell@dbl@", 8151);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@", 8152);
sendQuest("@dbl@@whi@Mods@whi@@dbl@", 8153);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::master ::pure ::sweet ::notedbarrows ::food ::dragonarmor ::dragonweapons@dbl@", 8154);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::kick ::modwear ::modrich@dbl@", 8155);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@", 8156);
sendQuest("@dbl@@yel@Admin@yel@@dbl@", 8157);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::banuser ::god ::pnpc ::normal ::xrichie ::xteletome ::xteleto@dbl@", 8158);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::runes ::barrage ::arrows ::bank ::adminwear@dbl@", 8159);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dbl@", 8160);
sendQuest("@dbl@@gre@Owner@gre@@dbl@", 8161);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::pickup ::ipban ::xteleall@dre@@dbl@", 8162);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::givemod ::giveadmin ::giveowner ::demote@dbl@", 8163);
sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::mantas@dbl@", 8164);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();

}[/code]the send quests are lines delete the ones with the " on them if you dont want that line change the text("example") to watever you want it to be.

3. makeGlobalObject(objid, x-coord, y-coord, direction, 10);//description
4. if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 1) { sendMessage("god mode off"); setAnimation(760); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[/code]

Read full topic
